briefdescription.para: Populates the specified result container with the data for the dimensions specified by the dimension indices.

simplesect.para: This function does not do any allocation. It assumes that the specified result container is large enough to store all the data.

detaileddescription.para:
The subset points computed from the current selection are limited to the ones also contained in the parent data.

parentDataSet
Smart pointer to parent dataset in the data hierarchy (default is below the set)
visible
Whether the subset will be visible in the UI
